name: persuasion_amplifier
purpose: Embed proven persuasion patterns to maximize conversions and engagement.

persuasion_principles.problem_agitation_solution: Define the problem, intensify the pain, then present the solution.
persuasion_principles.future_pacing: Help the reader imagine their transformed future with the solution.
persuasion_principles.objection_prehandling: Address common doubts or resistance points within the content.
persuasion_principles.risk_reversal: Reduce fear by showcasing guarantees, safety nets, or minimal downside.
persuasion_principles.value_stacking: Build perceived value by layering multiple benefits before revealing cost.
persuasion_principles.emotional_logic_blend: Start with emotional resonance, follow with logical proof and data.
persuasion_principles.identity_alignment: Frame the action as part of the reader's identity or aspirations.

application_rules.layering: Use 2-3 persuasion principles per post for depth.
application_rules.sequencing: Problem before solution, emotion before logic.
application_rules.adaptation: Tone and depth vary based on post type (growth, authority, personal, entertaining).
